about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Bor Dungeon is a fast paced action RPG mixing with platformer and simple puzzles. Smashing your way through dark dungeons defeating hordes of enemies and collecting loot, become the ultimate Bor!



Play as third person Bor, collecting loot, gain unique skills and smashing huge Bosses!

KEY FEATURES

▪️Action packed with physics: the game has interactive environment. You can jump on, smash, and examine anything in the level as your physics playground!
▪️Smooth and responsive movement and combat
▪️Cutesy design in enemies and environment
▪️Defeat big bosses to gain additional skills and unleash your full potential!
▪️No loot boxes, microtransactions or ANY additional purchases required- all content is available to unlock in game by playing.
▪️Each weapon type comes with different skill set.
▪️Challenging bosses with engaging combat!
Solo developed by Spikebor

SMACK THINGS WITH YOUR HAMMER

YOU CAN CLIMB ON BIG BOSS

CHALLENGING BOSS FIGHT!

GAIN NEW SKILL EACH BOSS DEFEATED

name: Bor Dungeon Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: core i3 3.3GHz
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Smashing your way across dark dungeons with your huge hammer to destroy all your enemies and obtain legendary loots in this cute top-down action/platformer rpg.
